value.name: Why Yolanda Saldivar Says She Killed Selena Quintanilla
value.description: Selena Quintanilla was the first Tejano artist to win a Grammy. She was shot to death by Yolanda Saldivar, her biggest fan, when she was only 23 years old on March 31, 1995. Saldivar says she ...
